src_original: rūpaṃ bhagavann abaddham amuktaṃ,  vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,  vijñānaṃ bhagavann abaddham amuktam.
tgt_original: 色無著無縛無脫，痛痒思想生死識無著無縛無脫。

src_original: rūpam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi,  vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,  vijñānam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi.
tgt_original: 「色無著無縛無脫，痛痒思想生死識無著無縛無脫。 何謂？

src_original: evam etad āyuṣman pūrṇa.  pūrṇa āha: katamat tad āyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yad abaddham amuktam?
tgt_original: 「色無著無縛無脫，痛痒思想生死識無著無縛無脫。 」邠祁文陀弗言：
